member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.ConfigurationImpl.UpdateGlobalValues(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,Epicor.Mfg.BO.ConfigurationValueDataSet)
member.summary: When paging paging forward to a lower level subassembly configured part, the GetxxxValues methods are called and the global variables defined in the ttConfigurationValue are updated from the ttGlbConfigurationValue table. This doesn't happen when paging backward from a subassembly configured part to a parent configured part. This procedure will update the GIVs in the current configurations ttConfigurationValue table from the ttGlbConfigurationValue.
member.param: The manufacturing company of the parent of the part being configured
The revision number of the parent part
The new page number we are moving to
Material Sequence of the parent part
Generated Rule Tag of the part being configured
The configuration test mode ("INPUTS" - Test Inputs Only, "RULES" Test Inputs and Rules, otherwise production mode)
